  org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.async.AsyncC2dmManagerFactory

public class AsyncC2dmManagerFactory
extends Object

Provides static methods for creating AsyncC2dmManager instances.

David R. Bild

Method Detail

create

public static AsyncC2dmManager create(C2dmManager manager,
                                      AsyncHandlers handlers,
                                      ScheduledExecutorService executor)
Creates an AsyncC2dmManager instance that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to deliver messages via a C2dmManager. AsyncHandlers are used to filter the messages and automatically handle to responses and exceptions.

The given C2dmManager must be thread-safe for as many threads as the ScheduleExecutorService will run concurrently.

An executor for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can created like this:
ScheduledExecutorService executor = new ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor(MAX_THREADS);

Parameters:
manager - the synchronous manager for communicating with the C2DM service
handlers - the handlers for automatically handling responses and exceptions
executor - the executor providing the background threads to deliver queued messages
Returns:
the constructed async manager

create

public static AsyncC2dmManager create(C2dmManager manager,
                                      ScheduledExecutorService executor)
Creates an AsyncC2dmManager instance that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to deliver messages via a C2dmManager.

A default AsyncHandlers instance that implements automatic retry with exponential back-off (globally for Service Unavailable and Quota Exceeded errors and per-device for Device Quota Exceeded errors) and honors Retry-After headers is registered.

The given C2dmManager must be thread-safe for as many threads as the ScheduleExecutorService might run concurrently.

An executor for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can created like this:
ScheduledExecutorService executor = new ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor(MAX_THREADS);

Parameters:
manager - the synchronous manager for communicating with the C2DM service
executor - the executor providing the background threads to deliver queued messages
Returns:
the constructed async manager

create

public static AsyncC2dmManager create(HttpClient client,
                                      AuthTokenProvider provider,
                                      AsyncHandlers handlers,
                                      ScheduledExecutorService executor)
Creates an AsyncC2dmManager instance that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to deliver messages via an C2dmManager instance constructed from the given HttpClient and AuthTokenProvider. AsyncHandlers are used to filter the messages and automatically handle to responses and exceptions.

The given HttpClient must be thread-safe for as many threads as the ScheduleExecutorService will run concurrently. An HttpClient instance for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can be created like this:
ThreadSafeClientConnManager connManager = new ThreadSafeClientConnManager();
conmManager.setMaxTotal(MAX_THREADS);
connManager.setDefaultMaxPerRoute(MAX_THREADS);
HttpClient client = new DefaultHttpClient(connManager);

An executor for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can created like this:
ScheduledExecutorService executor = new ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor(MAX_THREADS);

Parameters:
client - the client used to send HTTP requests
provider - the provider used to retrieve and persist authentication tokens
handlers - the handlers for automatically handling responses and exceptions
executor - the executor providing the background threads to deliver queued messages
Returns:
the constructed async manager

create

public static AsyncC2dmManager create(HttpClient client,
                                      AuthTokenProvider provider,
                                      ScheduledExecutorService executor)
Creates an AsyncC2dmManager instance that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to deliver messages via an C2dmManager instance constructed from the given HttpClient and AuthTokenProvider.

A default AsyncHandlers instance that implements automatic retry with exponential back-off (globally for Service Unavailable and Quota Exceeded errors and per-device for Device Quota Exceeded errors) and honors Retry-After headers is registered.

The given HttpClient must be thread-safe for as many threads as the ScheduleExecutorService will run concurrently. An HttpClient instance for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can be created like this:
ThreadSafeClientConnManager connManager = new ThreadSafeClientConnManager();
conmManager.setMaxTotal(MAX_THREADS);
connManager.setDefaultMaxPerRoute(MAX_THREADS);
HttpClient client = new DefaultHttpClient(connManager);

An executor for MAX_THREADS concurrent threads can created like this:
ScheduledExecutorService executor = new ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor(MAX_THREADS);

Parameters:
client - the client used to send HTTP requests
provider - the provider used to retrieve and persist authentication tokens
executor - the executor providing the background threads to deliver queued messages
Returns:
the constructed async manager
